option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value: $ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools/adb shell am instrument -r -w -e filter com.flowcrypt.email.junit.filters.DoesNotNeedMailServerFilter -e log true com.flowcrypt.email.debug.test/androidx.test.runner.AndroidJUnitRunner | grep -e "INSTRUMENTATION_STATUS: test" -e "INSTRUMENTATION_STATUS: class" -e "OK" | awk '!x[$0]++'
